p: Cytokine storm is one of the main mechanisms for acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), the systemic inflammatory response resulting from the release of large amounts of pro-inflammatory mediators including IFN-α, IL-1b, IL (6 − 12 − 18 and 33), TNF-α, TGFβ, etc. and chemokines by immune effector cells in SARS-CoV infection (Cameron et al. 2008; Huang et al. 2020). Patients with MERS-CoV infection showed elevated levels of pro-inflammatory mediators in the serum similar to infection with SARS-CoV (Min et al. 2016). The cytokine storm will be started by the immune system to cause ARDS and various organs to failure, which may be lead to death in severe cases infected with SARS-CoV-2 and MERS-CoV (Xu et al. 2020).
